Name: ERP -> BW/4 -> SAC
Description:
ERP -> Load data using that data generation report- New records will get added to the table in SH8 ERP system.
 BW/4 -> Run process chain which will load the delta records to ADSO in BW1 system.
 SAC -> Refresh of the dashboard in SAC will show the latest updated records.

Name: S/4 -> BW/4 -> SAC
Description:
S/4 -> Generate sales orders (90 orders) using that data generation report. New records will get added to the table in S/4H system.
 BW/4 -> Dataflow through the BW models (Open ODS views) and Queries which are already created based on S/4HANA CDS views.
 SAC -> SAC dashboard shows the updated data records.

Name: BW/4 -> HDFS -> SAC
Description:
BW/4 -> Move the data from Hot storage(BW’s HANA) to Hadoop.
 SAC -> SAC dashboard created on the Hadoop table will show the moved records.
 BW/4 -> Manually move back the data from the Hadoop to HANA.

Name: HDFS -> BW/4
Description: BW/4 -> Move the data from Cold storage to BW’s HANA.
